attributes.description: When dynamics meet luxury, the result is something unique: the BMW 8 Series Gran Coupé is a breathtaking four-door sports car with a generous sensation of space. Its design is aesthetics in its most thrilling form. It establishes a completely new design language for luxurious sports cars, conveying unbridled power and impressive agility. The BMW 8 Series Gran Coupé keeps this uncompromisingly sporty promise on every metre of asphalt. As soon as the spirited engine sends the rev counter soaring to new heights, passenger pulses start climbing too. In all four seats – in an irresistibly exclusive and at the same time impressively sporty ambience.
